comments:
I close ALL of my active editor windows and then click on the "open type"
toolbar button to open a class, the opened editor appears to be just gray with
no source.  The outline does not populate correctly either.  If I click on the
editor's tab, the outline with fill in, but the source still will not show up.

I believe this stack trace is for this error.  Although it seems to be similar
to the stack trace I added to Bug #105016.
